channel.title: Bronze VIP Posting Board Archives
channel.description: This feed collects the most recent posts for VIP Users of the various posting boards which cover our favorite Mutant Enemy shows--Buffy, Angel, and Firefly This syndicated feed only displays the posts as they are culled. For a more permanent (and more organized) archive, go to The Official Site

item.title: Bronze Beta Posts as of Fri Mar 16 07:15:02 2007 & Foo
item.description:
Christopher Golden says:
(Wed Mar 14 02:57:12 2007)
Gahhh! This five minute rule is for the birds. :)

While I was writing my post, those others came up.

Beldin, thanks for asking about Jenna. The series is, at least for the moment, over. The tenth book was THROAT CULTURE, which I think means you got half way. Lots of other stuff out there, though. I've been busy in my time away from Buffy.

Thanks again.

Night.

Christopher Golden says:
(Wed Mar 14 02:51:15 2007)
Carita, let's not worry about colors and such. I'm just dropping by to say hi. My VIP time is ancient history. :) Though I find I did kind of miss the Bronze.

Christopher Marlowe: Thanks for the vote of confidence.

And on that note, the long, slow drive-by ends. I'm wiped. Btw, like the rest of you, I can't wait for season 8 to start. I hope Joss does ten more seasons in the comics.

Adios.

Christopher Golden says:
(Wed Mar 14 02:42:58 2007)
Beldin, thanks. Good to see you, and some other familiar names as well. It's been a long time. :)

Christopher Golden says:
(Wed Mar 14 02:35:36 2007)
Hollyn, they're in middle school, and we're doing OLIVER! It could be a disaster, but with just a few rehearsals under our belts, I'm pretty impressed with the kids.

Previous Posts
